title: Hacked on my main account!
body: I just put in a ticket but the original details are long forgotten... I submitted a highlight video dating back to several patches ago to prove the account is mine and disclosed the last gift and to whom and added as much detail as possible but it says to see replies to my ticket I need to log in... I CAN'T LOG IN THAT'S WHY I'M SUBMITTING A TICKET IN THE FIRST PLACE! What do I do!? How do I fix this?!

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  You'll want to actually fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  This won't require you to login, and will allow you to also use an email you have access too.  Submit one via that instead, and we'll see you there!
That's what I did actually. I received the confirmation email with my message quoted. How will Riot contact me though? Via email?
Yeah, you'll see our response through there!

Okay... Sorry I'm just super upset and panicking. I've never been hacked in anything before :( 
While you're here, what happens if they spend the RP I had kept on the account for championship ashe? I'm not even sure if my credit card is saved O.o is there a way to "stop everything" while they investigate or whatever it is they're doing?

Don't worry friend, we got your back!  Our account team can help with both recovery as well as reparations.  We'll look into anything that was lost like RP!  In the meantime, I recommend going over our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info is secure.

If you like, I can look into locking your account until it's recovered.  Is it the one you're posting from?

No, if I could log into the main one we wouldn't be having this conversation ha :)


Account is Dartmaul100
